- make sure that you only share personal information on social media platforms that are trustworthy and have strong privacy policies in place.

- avoid giving out your phone number, address or other contact details to strangers online.
- check your account settings regularly and adjust them as necessary to limit the amount of personal data that is shared publicly.
- use strong and unique passwords for each account you have on social media platforms.
- be mindful of what information you share online and with whom. always think before posting anything personal or sensitive.
